summary: We've issued 11 comprehensive reports and numerous other reports on the COVID-19 pandemic. Our review of these reports identified lessons learned that could help federal agencies better prepare for, respond to, and recover from future emergencies. Implementing the recommendations in these reports can also improve preparedness. As of April 2024, we've made 428 recommendations to federal agencies and raised 24 matters for congressional consideration. Of...
title: COVID-19: Lessons Can Help Agencies Better Prepare for Future Emergencies
